name: Late photographer
description:
This is a visual novel game with rich plot.

It has four plot contents.

In the course of the plot, you can choose different plot trends.

The protagonist of the game is a photographer. Because my sister likes pranks, she is often late.

Game features:

When taking photos, you can choose different clothes for the model.

In the plot, there are different selection buttons to reach different plots.

There are seven female characters in the game. Has a large number of different clothes and shapes.

Please pay attention to more game content
https://space.bilibili.com/1988361363
